commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey guys, what do you think of this?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, the website for recruiting volunteers? It's done already?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yup, Rinari and I made it!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You're so good with stuff like this, Rina! I'm not at all, so I really respect that about you.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Thanks to Rina, we never have to worry about our online presence. You're amazing!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I-I'm gonna blush if you keep complimenting me so much... Rina-chan Board says, "Warm and fuzzy."

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ooh, show me too! Whoa, this looks great! It's so cute!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It really is. Just looking at it gets me all excited!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: And it's got such a clean design!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: All the relevant info is spread out so nicely. You two really did a great job.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: *Giggle*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's just as good as I knew it would be. I'm so glad I asked you two!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We did it, Rinari!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "Victory!"

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Only Ai and Rina could pull this off.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Rinari and Ai have great teamwork! Ai can hardly believe it! *Giggle*

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: So guys, should we go ahead and make the site go live?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, please.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Ooh, I'm so nervous... Do you think people will really sign up?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Don't worry, Emma. Everyone in the school is cheering us on!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: It's not just everyone at school.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Thanks to Honoka and Chika helping us do some PR, all the school idol fans are buzzing about our School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That's right, I keep seeing it all over social media.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I saw it too! Everyone's really looking forward to it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, did all of you know that Nijigasaki itself is also a hot topic right now?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, because Ayumu's performance during the school tour was so good!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wh-What?! Mine? R-Really? I have a hard time believing that.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: But AH, YOU MUst believe it, Ayumu!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Come on, Ai!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ahaha! But it's true that your performance really sparked something big.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And didn't the rest of you help Nijigasaki out by promoting your unique talents on social media? I think that's how people found out about you and became fans.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's all because you showcased each other's personal strengths that we've gotten this opportunity now! So have confidence!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We'll definitely get 1,000 people to volunteer!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah... You're right. I know we will!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It'll be a piece of cake to get 1,000. They'll sign up just like that, and we'll make Shioko beg for forgiveness!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: No, Kasumi, we're just asking for her permission.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh! Look!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What's up, Shizuku?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: We've already gotten almost 100 volunteers!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Whoa... That many while we were just chatting?!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Wow... The counter just keeps going up and up...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Whoa, that's wild... Kinda makes me worried that it could be a bug or something.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's working just fine, don't worry.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'm finally starting to realize just how big of an event the School Idol Festival is.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We're feeling the love of school idol fans from all over Japan!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah... Everyone's looking forward to it and cheering us on.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I got a message from a long-time fan saying they saw the volunteer recruitment site.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Chuckle* It says they signed up immediately!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I got one too!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: So did I!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Me too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's amazing, guys. Now the number is over 100!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: And it just keeps going up!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's how excited everyone is for the School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I told you that getting 1,000 will be a piece of cake!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yeah, this should mean we have nothing to worry about.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: We can't relax just yet, but I can already see a lot to be hopeful about on the horizon now!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's work even harder and go all the way to 1,000!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
